column4: how/what do i do to find a file on ubuntu? as in im looking for a game file but dont know where to start where as in windows i would look under "c"
Open a folder window, then Ctrl+F
which "folder" do i open
The one you want to search
thats just it i dont know which folder to start looking in
Ah ha! Found something!!
https://launchpad.net/~dnjl/+archive/multimedia
get the PPA (tell me if you don't know how), then sudo apt-get install circular-application-menu
thx but i figured they was a easier way to search for files to see where they located
what way?
oops i was talking to the wrong user
my bad
o ok but i appreciate all u help
not quite. do you need help installing it? if you do, PM me so we dont interrupt the other people
open a folder window. in the sidebar, click on Filesystem
then Ctrl+F
anyone. they all have the sidebar
Music, videos, whatever
what file are you looking for?
open a terminal, then "whereis freedink". try that
